Copy some file to the test directory that must be present, but are not passed to the hook as a file argument.

Source: R/testing.R
copy_artifacts.Rd

Copy some file to the test directory that must be present, but are not passed to the hook as a file argument.

copy_artifacts(artifacts, tempdir)

Arguments

artifacts

Artifacts to copy.

tempdir

The temporary directory.
